Other Pirate creatures you control get +1/+1.
When Hand of the [i]Red Fancies[/i] enters or is turned face up, conjure a card named Marauder’s Enlistment into your hand. [i](It’s a sorcery that costs {2}{B}{R} with “Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste and is a Pirate in addition to its other types until end of turn.”)[/i]
